email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15-20 October? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Looking forward to the agreement. Let’s aim to finalize everything by end of day. Best, John
